    • Uses of BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface in lowerboundmethods

      Classes in lowerboundmethods that implement BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
      Provides a framework for a lower bound estimation via the backward algorithm, based on a specific method to calculate the exercise trigger values.
      class  AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound
      Provides a framework for a lower bound estimation with caching used as input for upper bound methods, based on a specific method to calculate the exercise trigger values.
      class  AbstractLowerBoundEstimationWithoutCaching
      Provides a framework for a lower bound estimation without caching to increase performance, based on a specific method to calculate the exercise trigger values.
      class  SimpleLowerBoundEstimation
      Implements a lower bound estimation of a Bermudan Swaption value which caches values for reuse in upper bound methods.
      class  SimpleLowerBoundEstimationWithoutCaching
      Implements a lower bound estimation of a Bermudan Swaption value without caching.

      Method to construct callable Bermudan swaption for testing purposes from reduced input.
      private static double SimulationFactory.timingValuationTest(BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface valuationMethod, BermudanSwaption swaption, net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel liborModel)

    • Uses of BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface in upperboundmethods

      Classes in upperboundmethods that implement BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
      This class provides the framework for an upper bound estimation based on an abstract estimation of a martingale process following the primal-dual approach.
      class  AndersenBroadieUpperBoundEstimation
      Implements the Andersen-Broadie (2004) method of martingale approximation using sub-simulations.
      class  DeltaHedgingUpperBound
      Implements the upper bound estimation using AAD delta estimations as proposed by Joshi and Tang 2014
